name: Indian Spiced Wings
preparation: In a mixing bowl, whisk together marinade ingredients. Add wings, tossing to coat. Wings can be cooked immediately or marinated in refrigerator for up to 24 hours.
Arrange prepared wings on Sheet Pan lined with parchment paper, and bake for 20 minutes. Turn wings and cook for another 15 minutes. Broil wings for 3 minutes on each side, or until crisp and brown.
tips: 2 lbs chicken wings equals approximately 25 - 30 wings. If you buy whole wings, remove tips and freeze until the next time you need to make prepared Epicure Nourish Broth. Split wings at the joint to make 2 pieces.
Serve with your choice of our wonderful Epicure Dips.
